response.overview: Maia beautiful Italian woman arrives in Paris to try her luck. For lack of money, she reads out to Michel, the old blind man. Maia learns that Michel keeps a precious necklace. The girl becomes obsessed with the thought that once she will have the valuable jewellery, will be able to fulfill her dreams in Paris. The film is a surrealist image of a female destiny.
response.title: Le Collier
